title.rendered: Starting Anti-Racist Work: A Fireside Chat for Career Educators — July 2020

content.rendered:
Resources shared during the session:

  • Review the slides from the presentation
  • Read Harold’s blog post on the “Seven E’s of Starting Anti-Racist Work”

excerpt.rendered: Please join us for a fireside chat with Harold Bell, Director of the Office of Career Planning and Development at Spelman College, and Christine Cruzvergara, VP of Higher Education at Handshake.
